thread.title: New dotcom taxes mean Facebook's EU woes may grow

title: New dotcom taxes mean Facebook's EU woes may grow
text:
New dotcom taxes mean Facebook's EU woes may grow Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 01:12 
The European Commission has proposed new taxes on the largest multinational Internet companies perceived to avoid paying their fair share. It would be another blow to Facebook in the wake of the Cambridge Analytica leak.   
The European Commission has proposed new taxes on the largest multinational Internet companies perceived to avoid paying their fair share. It would be another blow to Facebook in the wake of the Cambridge Analytica leak.  //reut.rs/2pxJgmm
